{{cpp/title|get_pointer_safety}}
{{cpp/memory/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=memory|since=c++11|removed=c++23|
std::pointer_safety get_pointer_safety() noexcept;
}}

获得实现定义的指针安全模式，它是 {{lc|std::pointer_safety}} 类型的值。

===参数===
（无）

===返回值===
此实现所用的 {{tt|pointer_safety}}。

===示例===
{{example
|p=true
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;memory&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "指针安全性: ";
    switch (std::get_pointer_safety())
    {
        case std::pointer_safety::strict:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "严格\n";
            break;
        case std::pointer_safety::preferred:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "首选\n";
            break;
        case std::pointer_safety::relaxed:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "宽松\n";
            break;
    }
}
|output=
指针安全性: 宽松
}}
